title: How Does everyone relax during a loss in a ranked game or promos  :)
body: How Does everyone relax during a loss in a ranked game or promos  :)

replies.body:
Depending on time (i generally play at night)

- Shower
- Dinner
- Alcohol (in small amounts)
- Waste time trolling in blind pick
- Go play a different game

In promos however, i just straight up stop for the night, its not worth letting even the tiniest bit of tilt affect you in promos, better to come back fresh faced

I'm at a point where I simply don't give a single shyte as long as I've performed.

The games where you peform and lose, there's nothing that can be done.
I simply don't care anymore as promo games are won and loss during matchmaking. You either end up with a team who stomps the enemy or you end up with some boosted monkey who trolls your promos games.

If I lose a good game, I couldn't care less. I've been getting epic games lately, where it's super competitive and comes down to the wire.

The ones I fucking loathe are the ones in which one team just stomps the other. Whether it be enemy or ally, if I see people feeding their arses off and making stupid decisions, it tilts me the fuck out.
fuck relaxing, stress the fuck out and lose your sleep trying to gain that LP back.
